items.sentence: Why can\'t you just be grateful for what you have?
Why couldn\'t you just ask someone for directions?
I don\'t think anybody noticed what Tom was doing.
I don\'t think that I need to tell Tom to do that.
Who do you think is better at tennis, Tom or Mary?
Who on earth would want to do something like that?
Who was the one who suggested we sing these songs?
Aren\'t you the one who taught Tom how to do that?
Everyone in the room seemed to be talking at once.
Everyone in the village plans to be at the picnic.
Everyone thought that Tom could understand French.
I went to Australia when I was thirteen years old.
I wonder whether Tom really wants to go to Boston.
Tom lived in Boston until he was thirty years old.
Tom didn\'t think that he was going to get caught.
There\'s a very good chance that Tom will be late.
How long has it been since you\'ve been to Boston?
What\'s the average age of students in this class?
Would you like to see something really impressive?
Would you mind giving me a hand moving this table?
Would you mind taking care of my dog next weekend?
Would you recommend buying a house on Park Street?
How would you translate this sentence into French?
I left my umbrella here, but now I can\'t find it.
Tom and Mary are thinking about starting a family.
Tom thinks that he speaks French better than Mary.
Why do you think that Tom didn\'t want to do that?
Why don\'t you go upstairs and lie down for a bit?
Tom felt uneasy talking to Mary about that matter.
Male spiders have longer legs than female spiders.
Tom and Mary lived in the same apartment building.
When times get hard, let\'s see who sticks around.
Tom cooked an elaborate meal for Mary and himself.
Tom was sitting at the bar drinking a Bloody Mary.
She helped her younger brother finish his picture.
Are you saying that you don\'t want to go with us?
Tom won\'t get there on time if he doesn\'t hurry.
Tom was the one who taught Mary how to milk a cow.
Can you speak French as well as you speak English?
Do you know Tom well enough to ask him to do this?
I couldn\'t think of anything else I needed to do.
Remember to mail the letter on your way to school.
If you don\'t want to do that, you don\'t have to.
Would you like to have a bath before going to bed?
You\'re the one who needs to do that, aren\'t you?
You\'re the one who ought to do that, aren\'t you?
You\'re the one who suggested stealing Tom\'s car.
I told Tom that I wouldn\'t go to Boston with him.
Most of the students in the class agreed with Tom.
I think you\'ve put your sweatshirt on inside out.
